Verses: 1 dhaaveedhu Than Veettile Vaasamaayirukkirapodhu, Avan Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Naaththaanai Nokki: Paarum, Naan Kedhurumaraveettile Vaasampannugiren;karththarudaiya Udanpadikkaip Pettiyo Thiraigalinkeezh Irukkiradhu Endraan.
2 appozhudhu Naaththaan Dhaaveedhai Nokki: Ummudaiya Irudhayaththil Irukkiradhaiyellaam Seyyum; Dhevan Ummodu Irukkiraar Endraan.
3 andru Raaththiriyile, Dhevanudaiya Vaarththai Naaththaanukku Undaagi, Avar:
4 nee Poi, En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhai Nokki: Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Naan Vaasamaayirukka Nee Enakku Aalayaththaik Kattavendaam.

5 naan Isravelai Varappannina Naalmudharkondu Innaalvaraikkum Naan Oru Aalayaththile Vaasampannaamal, Oru Koodaaraththilirundhu Maru Koodaaraththukkum, Oru Vaasasthalaththilirundhu Maru Vaasasthalaththukkum Ponen.

6 naan Sagala Isravelodum Ulaavi Vandha Evvidaththilaagilum, Naan En Janaththai Meykkak Karpiththa Isravelin Nyaayaadhipadhigalil Yaadhoruvanai Nokki: Neengal Enakkuk Kedhurumaraththaal Seyyappatta Aalayaththaik Kattaadhirukkiradhu Enna Endru Yaadhoru Vaarththai Sonnadhu Undo?

7 ippodhum, Nee En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhai Nokki: Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Nee En Janamaagiya Isravelinmel Adhipadhiyaayirukkumpadi, Aadugalin Pinne Nadandha Unnai Aattumandhaiyai Vittu Eduththu,
8 nee Pona Idamellaam Unnode Irundhu, Un Saththurukkalaiyellaam Unakku Munbaaga Nirmoolamaakki, Boomiyilirukkira Periyorgalin Naamaththirku Oththa Naamaththai Unakku Undaakkinen.

9 naan En Janamaagiya Isravelukku Oru Idaththaiyum Erpaduththi, Avargal Thangal Sthaanaththile Kudiyirukkavum, Ini Avargal Alaiyaamalum, Munpolum, Naan En Janamaagiya Isravelinmel Nyaayaadhipadhigalaik Kattalaiyitta Naalmudhal Nadandhadhupolum, Nyaayakkettin Makkalaal Ini Sirumaippadaamalum Irukkavum Avargalai Naattinen.
10 un Saththurukkalaiyellaam Keezhppaduththinen. Ippodhum Karththar Unakku Oru Veettaik Kattuvaar Enbadhai Unakku Arivikkiren.
11 nee Un Pidhaakkalidaththile Poga, Un Naatkal Niraiverumpodhu, Naan Unakkuppinbu Un Puththiraril Oruvanaagiya Un Sandhadhiyai Ezhumbappanni, Avan Raajyaththai Nilaippaduththuven.
12 avan Enakku Oru Aalayaththaik Kattuvaan; Avan Singaasanaththai Endraikkum Nilaikkappannuven.
13 naan Avanukkup Pidhaavaayiruppen, Avan Enakkuk Kumaaranaayiruppaan; Unakku Mun Irundhavanai Vittu En Kirubaiyai Naan Vilakappanninadhupola, Avanai Vittu Vilakappannaamal,
14 avanai En Aalayaththilum En Raajyaththilum Endrendraikkum Nilaikkappannuven; Avanudaiya Raajaasanam Endrendraikkum Nilaipetrirukkum Endru Sol Endraar.
15 naaththaan Indha Ellaa Vaarththaigalinpadiyum Indha Ellaa Dharisanaththinpadiyum Dhaaveedhukku Sonnaan.

16 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhuraajaa Utpravesiththu, Karththarudaiya Samugaththilirundhu: Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Dhevareer Ennai Idhuvaraikkum Konduvandhadharku Naan Emmaaththiram? En Veedum Emmaaththiram?

17 dhevane, Idhu Innum Ummudaiya Paarvaikkuk Konjakkaariyamaayirukkiradhu Endru Dhevanaana Karththaraayirukkira Neer Umadhu Adiyaanudaiya Veettaikkuriththu Vegudhooramaayirukkum Kaalaththu Seydhiyaiyum Solli, Ennai Magaa Menmaiyaana Sandhadhiyin Manushanaagap Paarththeer.
18 umadhu Adiyaanukku Undaagum Kanaththaippatri, Dhaaveedhu Appuram Ummode Solvadhu Enna? Dhevareer Umadhu Adiyaanai Ariveer.
19 karththaave, Umadhu Adiyaanin Nimiththamum, Umadhu Irudhayaththinpadiyum, Indhap Periya Kaariyangalaiyellaam Ariyappannumpadikku, Indhap Periya Kaariyaththaiyellaam Seydheer.
20 karththaave, Naangal Engal Kaadhugalaal Ketta Ellaavatrinpadiyum Dhevareerukku Nigaraanavar Illai; Ummaiththavira Vere Dhevanum Illai.

21 umadhu Janamaagiya Isravelukku Nigaraana Janamum Undo? Poologaththil Indha Ore Jaadhiyai Dhevanaagiya Neer Umakku Janamaaga Meetkumpadi, Bayangaramaana Periya Kaariyangalinaal Umakkuk Keerththiyai Undaakki, Neer Egipthirku Neengalaakki Meetta Umadhu Janaththirkumunbaaga Jaadhigalaith Thuraththi,
22 umadhu Janamaagiya Isravelar Endraikkum Umadhu Janamaayiruppadharku Avargalai Nilaippaduththi, Karththaraagiya Neerdhaame Avargalukku Dhevanaaneer.
23 ippodhum Karththaave, Dhevareer Adiyaanaiyum Avan Veettaiyum Kuriththu Sonna Vaarththai Endrendraikkum Nilaivarappattiruppadhaaga; Dhevareer Sonnapadiye Seydharulum.

24 aam, Adhu Nilaivarappattirukkavum, Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Isravelukku Dhevan Endrum, Umadhu Adiyaanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Veedu Umakku Munbaagath Thidamaanadhendrum Sollappaduvadhinaal, Umadhu Naamam Endraikkum Magimaippadavumkadavadhu.
25 unakku Veedu Kattuven Endru En Dhevanaagiya Neer Umadhu Adiyaan Seviketka Velippaduththineer; Aagaiyaal Umakku Munbaaga Vinnappampanna, Umadhu Adiyaanukku Manaththairiyam Kidaiththadhu.
26 ippodhum Karththaave, Neere Dhevan; Neer Umadhu Adiyaanaikkuriththu Indha Nalla Viseshaththai Sonneer.

27 ippodhum Umadhu Adiyaanin Veedu Endraikkum Umakku Munbaaga Irukkumpadikku, Adhai Aaseervadhiththarulineer; Karththaraagiya Dhevareer Adhai Aaseervadhiththapadiyinaal, Adhu Endraikkum Aaseervadhikkappattirukkum Endraan.
